TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l ɪ s k ɔː s ts ɛ l ə æ s k ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː s t ɪ ŋ s w iː ɾ h ɚ w iː ɾ h æ f ɹ ʌ m d ᵻ s t ɔː s ɪ s p ʊ n s ʌ f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p i z f aɪ s t ŋ k s l æ p ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b ɪ ɪ s n æ ɡ f ɔːɹ h ɐ b l oʊ ɾ ɐ b ɔː b w ɪ ɔː l s oʊ n eɪ ɾ ᵻ s ɪ m p əl s m ɔː p l æ s t ɪ k s n ŋ k s æ n ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔː f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ d ɪ k iː z ʃ iː k eɪ n s k uː p d ɪ s t ɪ ŋ s ɪ n t ʊ t ɹ ɪ ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ s æ n d w ɪ w ɪ ɡ oʊ ɡ oʊ m ɪ t h ɑː w ɛ n z d eɪ æ d ə t ɹ æ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
